Articles.Content:
Introducing... The KerbAir-101 "Dingo"!

The KEAR-101 is a beautiful transport method, with room for a pilot and their co-pilot in the high visibility cockpit, and two passengers in the luxury yet comfortably compact cabin!

The first passenger aircraft produced by KerbAir, the 101 "Dingo" has a cockpit providing the equipment for a pilot and a co-pilot, and a cabin providing luxury for two, and it has a high range. there is no door between the cockpit and the cabin, so passengers can look at beautiful views outside of the high visibility cockpit. Perfect transport for honeymoons or other romantic events.

Cruising Speed: ~130m/s

Cruising Altitude: Undetermined.

With a burn time of seven and a half hours provided by twin "Hornet" prop engines, this craft is able to bring two infatuated Kerbs practically anywhere (On Kerbin) from the romantic town of Kenice to the glazed white beaches of Dachland's Crater Coast. This plane is sure to reliably bring you to whatever destination you so choose. With the safety of two operators, beautiful views from both the cabin windows and the high-visibility cockpit, reliable engines and a simple yet sweet wing design, with unique vertical stabilisers.

Passenger cabin includes a ladder for easy loading/unloading of passengers.

Enjoy! Purchase for your airport now! More info on this link.

Requires Lacks Stock Extension (SXT)

Disclaimer: Usage of the "mod" called "FAR" will probably stop this aircraft from functioning properly. Proceed with caution.

Enjoy! Have a safe flight!
